name: Lucid Lenses
description:
Lucid Lenses is a captivating story-driven romance adventure game that takes you on a journey of love, ambition, and tough decisions.

Follow the story of a couple who meet and fall in love, but as they pursue their individual career dreams, they find themselves facing a difficult choice: continue their relationship or break up for the sake of their careers.


+ ORIGINAL LOVE STORY WITH 2 ENDINGS
Lucid Lenses immerses you in the lives of the two main characters, and lets you experience their joys, struggles, and heartaches firsthand.


+ RICH AND COMPELLING NARRATIVE
From heartfelt conversations to dreamy flashbacks, from artistic challenges to career dilemmas, Lucid Lenses offers a rich and compelling narrative that is sure to captivate you from start to finish.

If you're looking for a game that offers a high-quality narrative, beautiful art style, and challenging gameplay, download Lucid Lenses now and discover the magic of true love!

+ UNIQUE VISUALS
Lucid Lenses features a charming watercolor art style for a unique and unforgettable experience.


+ 15 DIFFERENT MINI GAMES
Along the way, you'll encounter various game mechanics in the form of mini-games that add depth and excitement to the story.


+ FROM THE AWARD WINNING TAAWOOS GAME STUDIO
With their first award winning game, Shadow of Naught, Taawoos studio continue to produce yet another potentially award winning game, Lucid Lenses.
